name: Train Repair
description:
Want to become the best railway mechanic? You have such a wonderful opportunity. Introducing a new exciting game for kids - "Mechanic: repair trains." 
In our new development game, small locomotives are your best friends. But like the little disobedient children they sometimes get into big trouble, and they will need your help. The most unpleasant thing happens - it is a railway accident. 
And so, you are a very experienced mechanic, who has at his disposal a whole railway depot and a real workshop, in which small funny locomotives get on a very complex overhaul after their pranks. 
At your disposal is a huge set of tools, through which young professional repairmen have to repair broken trains. 
Your baby will need to carefully inspect the damaged train, and decide which tools will be used to repair the broken train. After all it can be not only external damages: various dents and rust, but also something more serious. 
After your child finds all the malfunctions: cleans dirt and rust, straightens all dents and welds holes with welding, eliminates all internal damage, he will need to take care of the appearance of a funky train. And without painting here can not do.
 
Choosing the most beautiful color, your young repairman takes over. At the end of everything - the kid chooses and pastes the most interesting and bright sticker, which will distinguish this children's train from others and make it the most beautiful and attractive. 
That's it. The repair is finished and your merry train is boundlessly grateful to you. He is again ready to set out on a journey to a happy adventure.
 
Our developing games for children, such as games about trains, help kids in the form of a game to learn the world around them, develop attention, observation and fine motor skills, through the game learn many other things that can be useful to them at an older age and adult life. 
The game about trains for children is the best choice for you and your child, which will help you to have fun and exciting for parents and children together for more than one evening, will enthrall your child with an interesting plot, the beauty of graphics, the variety of types of trains. 
Train for kids is not just a game. In the play form, your child will be able to get new skills and knowledge and master a wonderful and interesting profession - the mechanics of railway trains. 
All that is necessary is to download the train game and immerse yourself in the interesting, fascinating and very informative world of railway technology.
